text: The Swiss Junior Curling Championships are the national championships of men's and women's junior curling teams in Switzerland. Junior level curlers must be under the age of 21. The championships have been held annually since 1972 for junior men and since 1984 for junior women. The championships are organized by the Swiss Curling Association.Home - swisscurlingLook at :de:Swisscurling Association ==Men== ===Champions=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! scope="col"| Year
